#include<stdio.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<algorithm>
#include<limits>
#include<queue>
#include<string.h>
#include<math.h>
#include<set>
#define ll long long
#define MOD 1000000007

using namespace std;
int main()
{int t,n,i,r,re=0;
cin>>t;
   while(t--)
    {cin>>n;
    if(n==1)
        cout<<"1"<<'\n';
    else
        cout<<"0"<<'\n';
    }
}
